home.mainDescription: elee.menu guides you step-by-step through every step of your recipes, and lets you avoid common mistakes when you're preparing your meal.

steps.step2Description: Follow the recipe using the application
steps.step3Description: Enjoy your meal; you deserve it!

features.feature1Description: elee.menu is multi-plaform, so you can follow your recipe on any device you want wherever you want.
features.feature2Description: Recipes are taken from major popular foodie websites and reformatted to simplify them.
features.feature3Description: Ingredient quantities are specified directly in the step, in your prefered measure unit.
features.feature4Description: When a timer is required, you can activate one directly in the current step, or add one manually, as needed.

moar.title: More will come!
moar.description: Keep in mind that this is only a limited demo, to see how we can improve the engine. much more features will come, such as:
moar.nextFeatures2: Recipe search, searching through all major foodie websites
moar.nextFeatures4: Recipe saving and editing in your personal cookbook
moar.nextFeatures5: Recipe suggestions based on your preferences and achievements
